abstract.t: This document defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module formanaging the Internet Security Protocol (IPsec) and Internet KeyExchange (IKE) protocols and associated policies. Some of thepolicy-based packet filtering and the corresponding execution ofactions is of a more general nature than for IPsec configurationonly. This MIB module is designed with future extensibility inmind. It is thus possible to externally add other packet filtersand actions to the policy-based packet filtering system defined inthis document.
